text: I don’t understand people rating this movie so low because it’s fun to watch!

Funny in 1 hour and 39 minutes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Rated PG-13 for Sequences of Violence, Brief Strong Language and Sexual Content!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The USA grossed over $134,100,000.00!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Starring Ice Cube and Kevin Hart as detectives of the Atlanta Police Department in Atlanta, Georgia!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Dubbed and subtitled in worldwide studios!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Filme fraco, o roteiro é fraco, as cenas são fracas, a história é fraca, o elenco é fraco, e ninguém ajuda a melhorar o filme, os personagens são fracos, e o filme deveria ter cenas bem melhores e relevantes, para fazer o filme ser bom
Loved the comedy and great premise good movie overhated
Horrible comedy with a terrible plot.
pure entertainment and was really funny
It was a fun and enjoyable film, although the dialogue was a little offbeat/weird at times and the plot was a little cliched, I still liked it
Perfect movie that shows a lot of laughter and brilliant laughter
I loved this movie; I don't care what people say about it. This was one hell of a funny movie.
Maybe missing some elements, but overall entertaining and a perfect movie for family night.
This is one of my top 5 favorites now. Kevin Hart and Ice Cube work together immaculately. I'd love to see a 2nd, 3rd, or even 4th of this series.
Its just a movie for passing your time , there is no story but have some good comic timings . Overall, ordinary no storyline film with some comedy.
A great buddy cop film
A great balance between comedy and action until the end with constant references to games but it still holds up.
noah:says ice kevin tika your movie bad.
nice ride along those two dudes
Appalling. The only thing missing was canned laughter… and a cameo from Gary Coleman.
I've seen this film a lot and it never fails to make laugh even though i know what happens i always get a decent laugh out of it.
I watched this movie with a friend who said it is great and I gotta say it was I dont see why it has such that bad of rating it was so funny Kevin hard and Ice cube are just so fantastic together
